product.name: Deye 5kw Hybrid Inverter (SUN-5K-SG01LP1-EU)
product.description:
Deye 5kw Hybrid Inverter, is suitable for residential and light commercial use, maximizing self-consumption rate of solar energy and increasing your energy impendence.  
During the day, the PV system generates electricity which will be provided to the loads initially. Then, the excess energy will charge the battery via SUN 3/6K-SG04. 
Finally, the stored energy can be released when the loads require it. The battery can also be charged by the diesel generator to ensure uninterrupted supply in the event of grid blackout.
It equipped with RS485/CAN port for battery communication.
The New SUN-3K-SG04LP1 hybrid inverter adopts 24V battery, greatly improving your system safety.

## Description

### Smart Monitoring Platform
Thanks to the smart monitoring platform, Deye full series inverter products support remotely shutdown immediately when accident occurs.Setting parameters and FW update remotely, which makes PV plant O&M easier.
Includes:  Wi-Fi Dongle + BMS Communication Cable
product.short_description:
Product Highlights

Package Includes WIFI Dongle & Current Transformer
Max Efficiency of 97.6%
2 MPPT (Maximum Power Point Tracker)
RS485 / CAN Communication Ports
Load or Home power first with Zero Export to the Grid

product.name: LuxPower 5KW SNA5000 (LXP-SNA5000)
product.description:
The LuxPower 5KW SNA5000 Off-Grid Inverter is a battery inverter that provides you with a variety of ways to power your household devices.## LuxPower 5KW SNA5000 Description  * Intelligent off grid & hybrid modes
* PV & AC power loads simultaneously
* Wide PV input voltage range
* Easy to use with battery
* Free monitoring & remote upgrade
* Single phase or unbalanced three phase
* Advanced Parallel, up to 50kW
* Separate generator interface available
* Host inverter automatically generated to manage entire system
product.short_description:
Intelligent Off Grid & Hybrid Modes
Supports Paralleling up to 50KW
Single Phase / Unbalanced Three Phase
Easy to use with battery
Free monitoring & remote upgrade

product.name: Lux Power 5KW Hybrid Inverter LV Single Phase (LXP5K)
product.description:
Lux Power 5KW Hybrid Inverter has a newly designed solar and energy storage solution. The best off grid inverter, capable to install in on-grid solar, off-grid solar and back-up systems. LXP Hybrid enables a programmable and scheduled smart solar energy storage system to help increase your solar energy self-consumption rate, protect your home appliances from grid shortage, and balance your energy usage strategy to save energy bill. ## Lux Power 5KW Hybrid Inverter Description **Solar Input**
• Maximum DC Input Power: 8000W
• Nominal DC Input Voltage: 360VDC
• DC Input Voltage Range: 100VDC-550VDC
• MPPT Voltage Range: 120VDC-500VDC
• Start Voltage: 140VDC
• Number of MPP Trackers: 2
• Maximum DC Input Current: 12.5A / 12.5A **Battery Input / Output**
• Compatible Battery Type: Lithium-ion / Lead-Acid
• Nominal Battery Voltage: 48VDC
• Battery Voltage Range: 40VDC – 60VDC
• Maximum Charge / Discharge Current: 80A / 80A
• Maximum Charge / Discharge Power: 5000W / 5000W
• Charging Curve: 3 Stages **AC Input / Output**
• Nominal AC Output Power: 5000W
• Nominal AC Output Current: 25A
• Nominal AC Voltage: 230VAC (180VAC-270VAC)
• Nominal AC Frequency: 50Hz / 60Hz (45Hz-55Hz / 55Hz-65Hz)
• Power Factor: >0.99 @ Rated Power 0.8 Lagging – 0.8 Leading Adjustable **Environment Limit**
• Ingress Protection: IP65
• Relative Humidity: 0% to 100%
• Operating Temperature Range: -25°C to +60°C
• Operating Altitude: <2000m
• Communication: RS485 / WIFI / CAN

product.name: Deye 12kw Hybrid Inverter 3 Phase (SUN-12K-SG04LP3)
product.description: Deye 12kw Hybrid inverter SUN 5/6/8/10/12K-SG is brand new three phase hybrid inverter with low battery voltage 48V, ensuring system safe and reliable. With compact design and high-power density, this series supports 1.3 DC/AC ratio, saving device investment. It supports three phase unbalanced output, extending the application scenarios. Equipped with CAN port (x2) BMS and parallel, x1 RS485 port for BMS, x1 RS232 port for remotely control, x1 DRM port, which makes the system smart and flexible. Thanks to the smart monitoring platform, Deye full series inverter products support remotely shutdown immediately when accident occurs. Setting parameters and FW update remotely, which makes PV plant O&M easier.
product.short_description: Includes: Wi-Fi Dongle + BMS Communication Cable LCD Touch screen and buttons, easy operation. Compatible with lithium-ion battery and lead acid battery. Web browser and mobile App monitoring supported. PV lighting protection, Anti-islanding protection, Leakage current protection etc.

product.name: Deye 3kw Hybrid Inverter SUN-3.6
product.description:
Deye 3kw Hybrid Inverter SUN-3.6/5K-SG01/03LP1-EU was created for residential and light commercial use to meet all your energy needs.
The PV system produces electricity during the day, which is initially supplied to the loads. Then, the excess energy will charge the battery, so the excess energy in the battery is available when needed. The battery can also be charged by the diesel generator to ensure power supply in the event of power outage.

### Smart Monitoring Platform
Deye full series inverter products support remote shutdown instantly in the event of an accident because of the smart monitoring platform. Setting parameters and FW update remotely, which makes PV plant O&M easier.
Deye 3kw inverter come with RS485/CAN port for battery communication.

### Deye 3kw Hybrid Inverter Description:
* Colorful touch LCD, IP65 protection degree

* AC couple to retrofit existing solar system.

* Max. 16 pcs parallel for on-grid and off-grid operation; Support multiple batteries parallel

* Max. charging/discharging current of 140A

* 6 time periods for battery charging/discharging

* Support storing energy from diesel generator.
product.short_description: Deye 3kw Hybrid Inverter Single Phase was created for residential. \nHybrid solar inverters offer several benefits that make them a popular choice for homeowners and businesses.

product.name: Sunsynk 5kw Hybrid Inverter (SUN-5K-SG01LP1-EU)
product.description:
Sunsynk 5kw Hybrid Inverter will reduce your electricity costs by managing power from various energy sources, including solar panels, batteries, the national electricity grid, a generator or even a wind turbine – all with a Sunsynk Hybrid inverter. It’s ideal for home and business and scalable so that you can expand it as required.
Sunsynk 5kw Hybrid Inverter Description
User-friendly

LCD Touch screen and buttons, easy operation.
Compatible with lithium-ion battery and lead acid battery.
Web browser and mobile App monitoring supported.
Reliable

PV lighting protection, Anti-islanding protection, Leakage current protection etc.
Support store energy from DG when needed, ensure the system working within 7*24H.
IP65 protection degree, adapt to indoor and outdoor using.
Automatically switch from on-grid to off-grid mode within 5ms.
Zero exporting function, fast reaction within 200ms in zero export mode.
Smart

Programmable charging and discharging schedule.
Both wind turbines and solar panels can be connected as DC input power.
Max. 16 units can be paralleled for higher system power.
Retrofitting of existing solar system to energy storage system

product.name: Dyness 5kW Hybrid Inverter
product.description:
The Dyness 5kW Hybrid Inverter series is designed for residential hybrid systems.
The inverter can work with Dyness low-voltage lithium-ion battery DL5.0X/DL5.0C/ Powerbox Pro to maximize self-consumption and provide backup power if the grid fails and there is not enough PV power to cover load demand.

Description:

  • Generator connectivity with multiple input methods and automatic generator On/Off control.
  • Automatic UPS switching (<4ms)
  • Supportive peak shaving controls in both “self-use” and “generator” mode.
  • Up to 135A (5.0/6.0K) and 190A (8.0K) max charge/discharge current
  • 6 customizable charge/ discharge time settings
  • 10 second 200% surge power backup overload capacity.
  • Support 1ph and 3ph flexible connection with max 36kW (5.0/6.0K) and 48kW (8.0K) in parallel.
product.short_description: Dyness 5kW Hybrid Inverter series is designed for residential hybrid systems. The inverter can work with Dyness low-voltage lithium-ion battery DL5.0X/DL5.0C/ Powerbox Pro to maximize self-consumption and provide backup power if the grid fails and there is not enough PV power to cover load demand.

product.name: Sunsynk 50kW 3-Phase Hybrid Inverter (SUN-50K-SG01HP3)
product.description:
Introducing the Sunsynk 50kW 3-Phase Hybrid Inverter – the perfect solution for commercial and industrial applications. This high-efficiency inverter can handle up to 65,000W of energy, so you’ll never be without power!
With remote monitoring capabilities through our dedicated Sunsynk Connect app, you can track the efficiency of your system on-the-go, helping you to stay ahead of potential issues to ensure optimal performance.

## Description
Designed for easy installation and maintenance, the Sunsynk 50kW 3-Phase Hybrid Inverter will seamlessly integrate into your world to reduce costs, and provide reliable, renewable energy.
This power management tool allows the user to hit those ‘parity’ targets by managing power flow from multiple sources such as solar, mains power (grid) and generators, and then effectively storing and releasing power as and when utilities require.
product.short_description: Introducing the Sunsynk 50kW 3-Phase Hybrid Inverter – the perfect solution for commercial and industrial applications. This high-efficiency inverter can handle up to 65,000W of energy, so you’ll never be without power!

images.alt: Deye 50kw Hybrid inverter 3 phase with smart monitoring

product.name: Deye 30kw Hybrid Inverter 3 Phase (SUN-30K-SG01HP3-BM3)
product.description:
Deye 30kw Hybrid Inverter 3 Phase (SUN-30K-SG01HP3-EU)

The Deye 30kW Hybrid Inverter, SUN-30K-SG01HP3-EU, is a powerful and efficient solution for residential and commercial solar power systems. Thanks to its advanced features, intelligent energy management, and seamless integration capabilities, this inverter maximizes energy utilization, thereby promoting cost savings and reducing reliance on the grid.

Introduction
Solar power is increasingly popular as a clean, sustainable energy source. To maximize its potential, an efficient inverter is essential. The Deye 30kW Hybrid Inverter is an excellent choice for residential and commercial installations, thanks to its advanced features and superior performance. This article explores the Deye 30kW’s key features, benefits, installation process, performance, safety, maintenance, and integration with solar power systems.

Understanding Hybrid Inverters
Before we dive into the specifics, it’s important to briefly understand what hybrid inverters are. In essence, hybrid inverters are sophisticated devices that combine the functionality of a grid-tied inverter and a battery inverter. They allow seamless switching between grid power, solar power, and battery power, thus maximizing energy utilization and reducing reliance on the grid.

Key Features
Packed with an array of features that make it a standout product in the market. Some of its key features include:

High Power Output: Offers a robust power output of 30 kilowatts, making it suitable for both residential and commercial applications.
Three-Phase Compatibility: Designed to cater to three-phase power systems, this inverter ensures smooth operation and balanced power distribution.
Hybrid Functionality: With its hybrid capabilities, the DEYE 30Kw 3 Phase Hybrid Inverter allows for efficient utilization of solar power, battery power, and grid power, optimizing energy consumption.
Multiple MPPT Inputs: This inverter supports multiple Maximum Power Point Tracking (MPPT) inputs, enabling the connection of multiple solar arrays for increased energy harvesting.
Intelligent Energy Management: Equipped with advanced energy management algorithms, the DEYE 30Kw intelligently manages the flow of power, prioritizing renewable energy sources.
Monitoring and Control: The inverter provides comprehensive monitoring and control features, allowing users to track energy generation, consumption, and system performance in real-time.
Benefits of the DEYE 30Kw 3 Phase Hybrid Inverter
Investing in the DEYE 30Kw offers numerous advantages to solar power system owners. Some of the key benefits include:

Energy Independence: By integrating the DEYE 30Kw into a solar power system, users can reduce their reliance on the grid and achieve a greater level of energy independence.
Cost Savings: The intelligent energy management capabilities of this inverter result in significant cost savings by maximizing the utilization of free solar energy and minimizing grid electricity consumption.
Enhanced Efficiency: The DEYE 30Kw’s advanced technology ensures high conversion efficiency, allowing for the optimal utilization of solar energy and reducing energy wastage.
Seamless Integration: This inverter seamlessly integrates with existing solar power systems, making it a versatile solution for both new installations and retrofitting.
Environmental Impact: By harnessing solar energy effectively, the DEYE 30Kw 3 Phase Hybrid Inverter contributes to a greener planet by reducing carbon emissions and reliance on fossil fuels.
Installation and Setup
Installing the DEYE 30kW 3-Phase Hybrid Inverter is a straightforward process. However, it is best to consult a professional solar installer to properly install and configure the system, ensuring optimal performance and safety. Additionally, install the inverter in a well-ventilated area, providing adequate clearance and protection from the elements.
Performance and Efficiency
The DEYE 30Kw 3 Phase Hybrid Inverter is known for its exceptional performance and high efficiency. Its advanced technology and intelligent power management systems ensure maximum power output and seamless operation. The inverter’s high conversion efficiency helps in reducing energy losses and maximizing the return on investment for solar power system owners.
Safety and Reliability
Safety is of utmost importance when it comes to solar power installations. The DEYE 30Kw 3 Phase Hybrid Inverter adheres to stringent safety standards and incorporates various protection mechanisms to safeguard the system and its components. It features comprehensive protection against overvoltage, overcurrent, short circuits, and other electrical faults, ensuring a safe and reliable operation.
Maintenance and Warranty
The inverter comes with a standard warranty, thereby providing peace of mind to users in case of any manufacturing defects or malfunctions.

The DEYE 30Kw 3 Phase Hybrid Inverter seamlessly integrates with solar power systems of various sizes and configurations. Its compatibility with different types of solar panels and battery technologies makes it a versatile choice for residential and commercial applications. The inverter’s intelligent energy management ensures optimal utilization of solar energy, resulting in increased self-consumption and reduced dependency on the grid.
Conclusion
The DEYE 30Kw 3 Phase Hybrid Inverter, SUN-30K-SG01HP3-EU, offers a powerful and efficient solution for harnessing solar energy. With its advanced features, intelligent energy management, and seamless integration capabilities, this inverter provides numerous benefits to solar power system owners. It promotes energy independence, along with cost savings and environmental sustainability, while also ensuring high performance, safety, and reliability.
product.short_description: The Deye 30kW Hybrid Inverter, SUN-30K-SG01HP3-EU, is a powerful and efficient solution for residential and commercial solar power systems. Thanks to its advanced features, intelligent energy management, and seamless integration capabilities, this inverter maximizes energy utilization, thereby promoting cost savings and reducing reliance on the grid.

product.name: Fox 30kW 2nd Generation Hybrid Inverter
product.description:
Fox 30kW 2nd Generation Hybrid Inverter Highlights:

Power Output: The H3 Pro series is available in power classes ranging from 10 to 30 kW.

MPPTs: The H3 Pro series features 3 Maximum Power Point Trackers (MPPTs) for diverse solar-oriented rooftops.

DC Inputs: The inverters have high-current DC inputs.

Integration: The H3 Pro series is designed to integrate with smart homes and Fox ESS energy management systems.

Battery Inputs: The inverters offer a maximum of two battery inputs (2 Ports)* and a vast selection of battery options, enabling customers to expand their capacities up to 66 kWh each by adding 2 stacks of 1 master and 6 slaves ECS batteries.

Parallel Configuration: In industrial/commercial mode, several H3 Pro inverters can be configured in parallel, creating a battery system with a maximum capacity of 660 kWh.

Emergency Power Supply: The inverters are equipped with a built-in emergency power supply, allowing them to establish an independent grid for emergency power supply within 20ms or less during a blackout or grid disconnection.

Plug-and-Play: The H3 Pro series is an easy plug-and-play solution and fits perfectly with Fox ESS high voltage batteries-lines ECS 2800/2900/4100/4300/4800, as well as MIRA and HV 2600 batteries.

Communication Options: This series inverter is available with multiple communication options such as WiFi, GPRS, RS485, and Meter with an external device. Operating information like output voltage, current, frequency, fault information, etc. can be monitored locally or remotely via these interfaces.
product.short_description: Introducing the groundbreaking fox-30kw-2nd-generation-hybrid-inverter with an extended power output range of 10kW to 30kW. This inverter also allows for the option of parallel installation allowing for scalability up to an impressive 300kW maximum output.

images.alt: Fox Titanium 30kW Three - Phase Hybrid AC Inverter

product.name: LuxPower 6Kw Eco Hybrid Inverter
product.description:
The LuxPower 6Kw Eco Hybrid inverter supports several working modes, including Pure off-grid working mode: working as traditional off-grid inverters, can prioritize between using AC power or solar power. Hybrid working mode: working as a hybrid, supporting solar and utility jointly taking the load can choose between self- consumption mode or change priority mode.
With thousands of hybrid inverters & AC units installed around the world,
Luxpower has stepped even further to bring power to every home, with or without grid power.

LuxPower 6Kw Eco Hybrid series off grid inverters can support the system to work as back-up power or a replacement for diesel generator. Since the inverter support paralleling function. The capacity of the system can range from 3kW to 50kW.

Reclaim Your Power

Off grid seamless switching
Wide PV input voltage range
Great battery compatibility
Single Phase / Unbalanced 3-Phase
Support up to 16pcs in parallel.
Separate generator port available
Intelligent off grid & hybrid modes

product.name: Lux Power 12kW Hybrid Inverter Single Phase (LXP-LB12K)
product.description:
Lux Power 12kW Hybrid Inverter Single Phase is new design of solar and battery inverter that you can use in on-grid solar, off-grid solar and back-up systems. 

The LXP Hybrid implements a programmable and scheduled intelligent solar storage system. This power inverter battery can help increase your solar energy self-use and protect your home appliances from grid shortages. Power battery inverter can also balance your energy use strategy to save on energy costs

product.name: Fox 10.5 2nd Generation Hybrid Inverter
product.description:
**The Fox 10.5 2nd Generation Hybrid Inverter **

The all-new Single Phase 10.5kW Hybrid Inverter full of advanced features paired with the Fox Energy Cube range of high voltage battery storage. A lego block style 4.03kWh stackable.


**Fox 10.5 2nd Generation Hybrid Inverter Highlights:**

* The FoxESS 10.5 supports up to 15kW solar panels\xa0
* 4 MPPT trackers\xa0
* 10.5kW Continuous backup power\xa0
* 12kW for 60 seconds\xa0
* Can be installed in parallel for up to 10 units\xa0
* High voltage lego block 4.03kWh battery from 3 pcs – 7 pcs for up to 28.21kW\xa0
* Monitor the system remotely using a web portal or smartphone app / Remote system updates
* South African Grid Certified (NRS97-0-2-1) / On the approved Inverter list for the City Of Cape Town\xa0
product.short_description: Fox 10.5 2nd Generation Hybrid Inverter Harness the power of the sun day and night with the ground-breaking range of Hybrid & AC inverters from FOX. Full of advanced features and compatible with our very own range of high-voltage batteries, the hybrid range from FOX is a new class of Inverter.

product.name: Fox 8kW 2nd Generation Hybrid Inverter
product.description:
The Fox 8 & 8 is an 8kW Hybrid Inverter with 8.2kWh of High Voltage battery that supports 8kw of load. It has 3\xa0MPPT’s, supports up to 12kW of solar panels and can be installed in parallel.
Fox 8kW 2nd Generation Hybrid Inverter Highlights:

Fast & Simple Installation
3 MPPT trackers – Supports up to 12kW of solar panels.
Up to 10kW EPS Output for 60 seconds (with 4 batteries installed)
8 kW Fast Grid Charger
Easy Battery expansion up to 19kWh
Supports Parallel Installation
10 Year Inverter and Battery Warranty

Fanless Inverter / Low Noise Operation
All the components are engineered and integrated by one manufacturer

South African Grid Certified (NRS97-0-2-1)

product.name: Deye 16kw Hybrid Inverter (SUN-16K-SG01LP1-EU)
product.description: Deye 16kw Hybrid Inverter, is suitable for residential and light commercial use, maximizing self-consumption rate of solar energy and increasing your energy impendence.   During the day, the PV system generates electricity which will be provided to the loads initially. Then, the excess energy will charge the battery via SUN 12/14/16K-SG. Finally, the stored energy can be released when the loads require it. The battery can also be charged by the diesel generator to ensure uninterrupted supply in the event of grid blackout. Description Smart Monitoring Platform Thanks to the smart monitoring platform, Deye full series inverter products support remotely shutdown immediately when accident occurs. Setting parameters and FW update remotely, which makes PV plant O&M easier. Deye 16kw Hybrid Inverter Single Phase come with RS485/CAN port for battery communication.

product.description: The Huawei Inverter 5kW and 5.12kWh Battery All-in-One is a hybrid inverter system that combines a solar inverter and a lithium- ion battery into a single unit. This makes it a popular choice for homeowners who want to back up their homes with solar power during outages. Redefine Renewable: The Huawei Inverter Experience. Innovation Meets Power: The Introduction of Huawei Inverters in South Africa.

product.description:
Sunsynk 8kw Hybrid Inverter will reduce your electricity costs by managing power from various energy sources, including solar panels, batteries, the national electricity grid, a generator or even a wind turbine – all with a Sunsynk Hybrid inverter. It’s ideal for home and business and scalable so that you can expand it as required.

product.name: Sunsynk 16kW Single Phase Hybrid Inverter (SUN-16K-SG01LP1)
product.description:
We have taken the Sunsynk 16kW Single Phase Hybrid Inverter to the highest level. Our new Sunsynk MAX is the most powerful low-voltage inverter in the world, achieving a maximum output power of 16kW and a battery charge current of 300A.

This power management tool allows the user to hit those ‘parity’ targets by managing power flow from multiple sources such as solar, mains power (grid) and generators, and then effectively storing and releasing power as and when utilities require.

## Description

### Interactive

* Supporting Wi-Fi or GSM monitoring
* Visual power flow screen
* Parallel / multi invert function grid-tied and off-grid

### COMPATIBLE

* Compatible with main electrical grid voltages or power generators
* Self-consumption and feed-in to the grid
* Auto restart while AC is recovering
* Auto earth bond feature (Via a relay)

### CONFIGURABLE

* Fully programmable controller
* Programmable supply priority for battery or grid
* Programmable multiple operation modes: on-grid/off-grid & UPS
* Configurable battery charging – current/voltage based on the application
* Configurable AC / solar / generator charger priority by LCD setting

### SECURE

* Overload/over-temperature/short-circuit protection
* Smart battery charger design for optimized battery protection
* Limiting function installed to prevent excess power overflow to grid

product.name: Deye 12kw Hybrid Inverter Single Phase (SUN-12K-SG01LP1-EU)
product.description:
Deye 12kw Hybrid Inverter Single Phase was created for residential and light commercial use to meet all your energy needs.
During the day, the PV system generates electricity which will be provided to the loads initially. Then, the excess energy will charge the battery. You can use the excess energy in the battery when needed. The battery can also be charged by the diesel generator to ensure power supply in the event of power outage.

### Smart Monitoring Platform
Thanks to the smart monitoring platform, Deye full series inverter products support remotely shutdown immediately when accident occurs. Setting parameters and FW update remotely, which makes PV plant O&M easier.

Deye 12kw Hybrid Inverter Single Phase come with RS485/CAN port for battery communication.

Support storing energy from diesel generator.

product.description:
SRNE 3KW Hybrid Off Grid Inverter is perfect for small residential energy storage solution for off-grid and hybrid systems designed to meet the electricity needs of your home.
Off-grid solution provide power to your home that are not connected to the traditional electrical grid, while hybrid solutions combine renewable energy generation and energy storage with grid connectivity for added flexibility and backup power.

product.name: 8kW Deye Loadshedding Backup Kit DEYE
product.description:
8kw Deye Loadshedding Backup Kit perfect for home during the times when their is loadshedding. Can provide power for loads up to 8kW. 
With app monitoring you can see when the system is providing power from the battery, grid or from your solar panels. The kit has been made from our years of experience to give you the best for the money without skipping on the technology and on what you may need to stay on during loadshedding.
With MPPT chargers build into the Hybrid inverter charging can happen from solar and from the grid.

8kW Deye Loadshedding Backup Kit Description 

1 x Deye 8kW Hybrid Inverter (8kW) – City of Cape Town Approved Hybrid Inverter
2 x Shoto 5.12kW Lithium Ion Battery (5.12-100ah) – 10 Year Warranty (Batteries can be changed to other brand, extra charges may apply)
1 x 8kw AC Changeover Box Ip65 ( Unwired )
1 x Onesto 3 Pole Battery Disconnect
2 x 160A DC Fuses
Other smalls included (You can contact the office to ask for an itemized list if needed)
